 IDENT i

INTLIT 37
SCOLON 
 IDENT test
LPAREN 
 IDENT foo_val
LPAREN 
 IDENT i
RPAREN 
 COMMA 
INTLIT 37
 COMMA 
STRLIT foo_val(i) == 37
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
 IDENT test
LPAREN 
 IDENT foo_ptr
LPAREN 
 REFOP &
 IDENT i
RPAREN 
 COMMA 
INTLIT 37
 COMMA 
STRLIT foo_ptr(&i) == 37
